content.question: Which of the following best serves as evidence in support of Levineâ€™s claim?

choices.label: The blues originated in the South and traveled northward in the Great Migration.
The foundation of the blues was established on African musical traditions.
The radio contributed to the spread of African American musical genres.
The blues conveyed emotional themes of despair, hope, love, and loss.

content.answer: The blues conveyed emotional themes of despair, hope, love, and loss.

topic.text: 3.14: Symphony in Black: Black Performance in Music, Theater, and Film

skill.text: 3.B: Support a claim or argument using specific and relevant evidence.
